product.name: Tempered Glass Cutting Board – 16"x20" Clear Kitchen Counter Protector, Heat & Scratch Resistant, Non-Slip Feet - Large
product.description:
Hygienic and decorative

Non-slip real silicone feet

5mm thick tempered glass




While the tempered glass cutting board is durable and break-resistant, please note the following to avoid damage:
product.bullet_points:
• Durable Tempered Glass Construction: Crafted from premium tempered glass, this cutting board offers exceptional durability, resisting scratches and heat up to 500°F.
• Non-Slip Rubber Feet: Equipped with four non-slip rubber feet to ensure stability during food preparation, preventing unwanted movement on countertops. Extra 4 non-slip rubber feet included in box for a peace of mind.
• Hygienic & Odor-Resistant Surface: The non-porous glass surface resists stains and odors, providing a sanitary cutting experience and easy cleaning.
• Multipurpose Kitchen Tool: Ideal for slicing, dicing, and serving; also functions as a trivet for hot pots and pans, protecting your countertops.
• Easy to Clean: Safe for effortless cleanup, maintaining its pristine appearance after each use.
